servinfo.title: Sub Fuel Level Gauge Removal and Installation

attention2.ptxt: Do not touch resister plate (1) and deform arm (2). It may cause sub fuel level gauge to fail.

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel tank from vehicle Referring to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model
Disconnect sub fuel level gauge connector (1) referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:For Diesel Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Replace O-ring with new one using care not to damage it.
Apply thin coat of fuel to O-ring, and then install sub fuel level sensor.
